name: TimeJump (TheGrandao)
description:
Controls 

A/D: Horizontal Movement

Space: Hold to charge jump, release to jump (Hold directional input A/D to jump in specific direction)

Shift: Let's you de-accelerate the flying monsters to use them as platforms.

This is the first game i ever built and my first game jam! Looking forward for the feedback you guys will be able to give me. 

Working on the following bugs: 

  • Character sprite disappearing when crouching without directional input
  • Character Sprite behaving weirdly when hitting walls/ground with certain force

I will be adding music/SFX at a later date if possible, probably on the day before submission.

Original art assets by penusbmic
